calculator

Class Logic

  • java.lang.Object
    • calculator.Logic

  • public class Logic
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates the logic and arithmetic for the calculator, each method is called from Calculator.java to manipulate the number and make the buttons and numbers perform as a calculator should, numbers are passed in and out then stored in strings to be printed out in the UI, which Calculator.java controls.
    Since:
    13/11/2014

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Logic() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double backSpace(double number)
      This deletes the latest entry from the field, until you run out of entries to delete
      static double divide(double number)
      Gets the first operand from the text field then waits until a second operand is inputted, then does the calculation of operand 1 / operand 2, then returns the total back to the field
      static double equals(double number)
      Updates the textField to show the latest arithmetic by forcing the second conditions in each operator to trigger and return it to the field without having to click on the operator, it passes the number from the text field to the correct method based on what operator was flagged.
      static double getNumber(double number)
      Gets the number from the last button inputted and stores it as a double, everytime a new number is pressed, the current numbers are increased by *10 If Decimal is pressed the opposite happens, every new number is decreased by /10*n with n being the amount of decimal numbers
      static double invertNumber(double number)
      Inverts the number in the textField by taking the number and multiplying the number by -
      static double minus(double number)
      Gets the first operand from the text field then waits until a second operand is inputted, then does the calculation of operand 1 - operand 2, then returns the total back to the field
      static double percent(double number)
      Takes the number from the text field, stores it as the first operand, waits for an operator and second operand before calculating the percentage, using operand1 + (operand1 operator operand2)
      static double plus(double number)
      Gets the first operand from the text field then waits until a second operand is inputted, then does the calculation of operand 1 + operand 2, then returns the total back to the field
      static double reciprocal(double number)
      Calculates the reciprocal of the number inputted into the text field by, getting the number and seeing how many times it goes into 1
      static double reset(double number)
      This resets all of the flags, operands and sets the number(text field) to be the first operand, this mimics clear entry and returns back to the last first operand, if you added a clearance of the first operand this also mimics clear all
      static double sqrt(double number)
      Calculates the square root of the number in the text field by bringing in the number and using Math.sqrt then returning the number to the text field
      static double times(double number)
      Gets the first operand from the text field then waits until a second operand is inputted, then does the calculation of operand 1 * operand 2, then returns the total back to the field

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Logic

        public Logic()

    • Method Detail

      • getNumber

        public static double getNumber(double number)
        Gets the number from the last button inputted and stores it as a double, everytime a new number is pressed, the current numbers are increased by *10 If Decimal is pressed the opposite happens, every new number is decreased by /10*n with n being the amount of decimal numbers
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        numbers to the textField, which update everytime another button is pressed

      • invertNumber

        public static double invertNumber(double number)
        Inverts the number in the textField by taking the number and multiplying the number by -
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the inverted number to the textField

      • plus

        public static double plus(double number)
        Gets the first operand from the text field then waits until a second operand is inputted, then does the calculation of operand 1 + operand 2, then returns the total back to the field
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the added total back to the textField

      • minus

        public static double minus(double number)
        Gets the first operand from the text field then waits until a second operand is inputted, then does the calculation of operand 1 - operand 2, then returns the total back to the field
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the subtracted total back to the textField

      • times

        public static double times(double number)
        Gets the first operand from the text field then waits until a second operand is inputted, then does the calculation of operand 1 * operand 2, then returns the total back to the field
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the multiplied total back to the textField

      • divide

        public static double divide(double number)
        Gets the first operand from the text field then waits until a second operand is inputted, then does the calculation of operand 1 / operand 2, then returns the total back to the field
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the divided total back to the textField

      • sqrt

        public static double sqrt(double number)
        Calculates the square root of the number in the text field by bringing in the number and using Math.sqrt then returning the number to the text field
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the square root of the number to the textField

      • reciprocal

        public static double reciprocal(double number)
        Calculates the reciprocal of the number inputted into the text field by, getting the number and seeing how many times it goes into 1
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the reciprocal of the number in the textField

      • percent

        public static double percent(double number)
        Takes the number from the text field, stores it as the first operand, waits for an operator and second operand before calculating the percentage, using operand1 + (operand1 operator operand2)
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the percentage + operand of the first operand

      • equals

        public static double equals(double number)
        Updates the textField to show the latest arithmetic by forcing the second conditions in each operator to trigger and return it to the field without having to click on the operator, it passes the number from the text field to the correct method based on what operator was flagged.
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the result of the latest arithmetic

      • backSpace

        public static double backSpace(double number)
        This deletes the latest entry from the field, until you run out of entries to delete
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the number with it's length - 1 to represent the last element being taken off

      • reset

        public static double reset(double number)
        This resets all of the flags, operands and sets the number(text field) to be the first operand, this mimics clear entry and returns back to the last first operand, if you added a clearance of the first operand this also mimics clear all
        Parameters:
        number - the current number in the textField
        Returns:
        the number resets to 0
